mapper.insert: insert into question_info (id, question_type, question_content, qnr_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qNRId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
